result.execSummary:
All charges against Adam Michael Fonseca in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Adam Michael Fonseca is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Adam Michael Fonseca

records.addlTxt:
03:46 PM Defendant Adam Michael Fonseca in court.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin. PARTIES APPEAR BY VIDEO.
Case set for a preliminary hearing. Stated moves to dismiss. Court orders case dismissed without prejudice.

Adjustment Number: 22A 033339,
Payable Number: 998010,
Receipt Number: 22RP014023,
Amount: $20.00
Court ordered no possession or use of controlled substances without a valid prescription, and no dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Adam Michael Fonseca in court with attorney Ashley Fard.  Samuel E. Simpson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Stark, Branch 17.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT DOES QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Adam Michael Fonseca in court.  Kathryn Ginsberg appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case is adjourned back to Br. OCCR to allow defendant time to retain private counsel.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for April 4, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Summons mailed.  Defendant ordered into room 221 Safety Building on 3/21/22 @ 1:30p
